description: Amendments to planning permission dated 20 July 2021 (RN: 20/07187/FULL) for demolition of existing property and erection of a five-storey building (with basement level) incorporating a lightwell to the Elgin Avenue frontage and plant at roof level to provide a commercial unit at ground and basement and residential dwellings at basement, ground and upper levels.; NAMELY, improved layout of residential units; incorporation of unit F3, F5 and F7 balcony space into internal space; reduction of unit F8 amenity space; relocation of staircase and lift shaft; amendments to windows and doors; reduction of size and reconfiguration of basement level commercial space; reconfiguration of ground floor commercial space; circular staircase for fire escape from basement level; reduction of floor-to-floor heights at all levels; reduction in roof footprint and plant reconfiguration; increase of window dormer cheeks and roof thickness; introduction of smoke shaft and other services for fire and building regulations.
